# include<iostream>
# include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int hcf(int n,int x)
{
    if(n<x)
    {
        int temp=x;
        x=n;
        n=temp;
    }
    int divisor=x;
    int dividend=n;
    int remainder=n%x;
    int hcf;
    while(true)
    {
        remainder=dividend%divisor;
        if(remainder==0)
        {
            hcf=divisor;
            break;
        }    
        dividend=divisor;
        divisor=remainder;
    }    
    return hcf;
}            
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int q=1;q<=t;q++)
    {
        int count;
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n==2)
        count=1;
        else
        {
        count=2;
        int diff=2;
        for(diff=2;diff<=n-2;diff++)
        {
            int boo=hcf(n,diff);
            if(boo==1)
            count++;
        }
    }    
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }        
//system("pause");
return 0;
}
